::Darkfate::

Darkfate was really mad inside his dark throne-room. His men=
ssago to DarkPrime hadn't been recived and... He was expected that Vamprah =
got contact with Zardus in order to get his dark purpouse... But anything h=
ad happened....By unicrom and all his servants... That femme-bot was guilty=
 of all. His impatient increased every time while his sharped fingers drumm=
ing around a big square red button, that was in arm-throne, when he was thi=
nking about... Suddenly he pressed furios the button.

:: Vamprah::

Vampra=
h was in stasis lock inside cr chamber, and in the same moment that Darkfat=
e pressed the red button, a light in the necklance started to blink, and se=
conds later Vamprah recived a strong discharge of energy, that made her scr=
eam of pain. Her agonyc scream sounded in whole ship.

::Bat-probe ::

The =
probe that  was send to Dark Prime's lands recived the order to find him. I=
t used its scanners in order to seek and find
